description: Discover available methods on any JSON-RPC endpoint. Invoke methods with custom parameters to test and automate workflows. Validate integrations faster by exploring, calling, and iterating in one place.

capabilities.name: rpc_call
capabilities.description: Call any JSON-RPC method on a server with parameters. A user would prompt: Call method <method> on <server url> with params <params>

capabilities.name: rpc_discover
capabilities.description: This uses JSON-RPC to call `rpc.discover` which is part of the OpenRPC Specification for discovery for JSON-RPC servers. A user would prompt: What JSON-RPC methods does this server have? <server url>
